Posts.Content: I think he did chemotherapy. He also suffers from depression and the cancer treatment made him nauseated. He has problems walking and is overweight.
Posts.Title: Biggest struggle with prostate cancer

Posts.Content: Hello, all brave people! What would you say is the biggest challenge or frustration youre having with prostate cancer?
Posts.Title: Biggest struggle with prostate cancer

Posts.Content: Yes, one man I know really well got diagnosed with prostate cancer. I just wanted to know how it feels for other people. I find it really hard to see him suffer.
Posts.Title: Biggest struggle with prostate cancer
